title: Open House
lede: San Juan Island Fire and Rescue is Hosting an Open House
body:
**San Juan Island Fire and Rescue is Hosting an Open House at our Headquarters' Station on Mullis Street**

![](/assets/images/jet.bmp)

**When:**  Saturday, May 28, from 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.

**Where:**  1011 Mullis Street

We hope you will join us for BBQ Hot Dogs, Chips, and Drinks sponsored by the San Juan Island Firefighters Association.

There will be Exhibitions and Demonstrations.

Come out and meet the Firefighters who keep our island safe and say hello to our new Academy Graduates! You can even meet and greet our Crisis Response Canines!

We look forward to you joining us for some food and fun!

![](/assets/images/training.bmp)
